0: i am mad i have been diagnosed for 2 years as bp2 but today my psychiatrist told me that she did not actually have bp2 as my diagnosis she was not sure if it was bp2 or bp1 but was leaning towards bp2 but now she is saying i am bp1 my question is why did she never tell me any of this until now i do not think she was even going to bring it up initially we were filling out fmla paperwork and she had to remember what my diagnosis was and when i said bp2 she looked at her notes and said well i actually have you down as bp 1 or 2 i do not know how to feel god damn it plus she does not even take my insurance anymore and that seeing her cost me 230 instead of 25 like it used to fuck it at least my meds work

eating habits dae notice that their eating habits change i will go through phases where i am able to be so on point eat healthy make good choices and then there will be periods usually like a month where i just eat like garbage and feel like i have no self control and gain back the weight i had worked so hard to lose it is so frustrating especially because i lost 20lbs this year and i have gained 5 of it back i know that is not a huge amount but i am a small person so it is noticeable and it is just frustrating to lose it and then gain it back i really want to continue on my healthy lifestyle and eat right and exercise and make physical and mental progress does anyone have any tips for staying on track
1: i cannot take it anymore for the past five days i have had at least one mental breakdown a day sometimes multiple every time i think about something that stresses me out i have to immediately focus my mind on something else or i will have a panic attack at night i cannot sleep because of my frequent attacks and crying spells i have never felt so anxious in my life and i do not know what to do for the past two hours at work i have been trying not to break down and trying not to show it when i go to my psychiatry appointments i always feel fine and then i leave and start feeling awful i am so miserable that i just want to die but i am so afraid of dying that when i think about it i just get more panicky everyone thinks i am okay and because my moods tend to change so quickly no one ever believes when i tell them i am doing so bad and i want to die they think it will pass and i will be fine but the bad feelings always come back and i physically cannot fight this battle any more

3: vacation while unstable hi all i have been lurking on this sub for about 2 5 weeks after having been rediagnosed as bp2 by my new pdoc previously diagnosed mdd nov 2015 i have been hypomanic for about 6 weeks now and just started depakote 2 weeks ago and latuda yesterday i am supposed to fly out to new york today to visit a good friend i live in california but yesterday when i met with my pdoc he wanted me to go to the hospital voluntarily so i could get my medication dosages up and going a lot quicker he could not make me go because i am not outright suicidal but i have been extremely irritable and impulsive the past month and a half and he noted that my safety could easily be compromised in a different state with new stressors just looking for some advice from any of you who have more experience with this than i do my judgment is clouded and i really do not know what to do my flight is at 10pm tonight if i decide to go so i still have plenty of time to decide tia

mistakes mistakes so i posted last week about going on a trip across the country when my pdoc told me i should probably go voluntarily to inpatient to stabilize my new meds diagnosed bp2 about a month ago now on depakote and latuda of course i did not listen went on the trip was mixed the whole time and had a crappy experience overall including not being able to get home for an extra day because united cancelled mine and everyone else s flight i came back last night and had to work this morning and i started imagining various ways to get out of work for tomorrow including but not limited to crashing my car on the freeway i thought i was just beyond tired because i was stuck in the airport for 18 hours yesterday and had not slept but after 9 hours last night and having just woken up from another 4 5 hours still feeling like a swift end would be my best bet at this point what do i do i am afraid if i drive i will hurt myself or someone else even just to go to the hospital which is only 5 mins away also live in us so there is no way in hell i am calling 911 help
